name: OG Shark
description: OG Shark, a rare strain found primarily in Canada, sets high standards with its impressive THC content and pungent, earthy aroma. Patients most commonly turn to this heavy-hitter for nausea, pain, and sleep disorders, as well as many other symptoms.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Giggly, Stress, Pain, Spasticity, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
